greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Continued fraction for log(2).
comment: Continued fraction for 1/log(2) is the same but without the initial zero.
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Natural Logarithm of 2
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
program: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 21000); x=contfrac(log(2)); for (n=1, 20000, write("b016730.txt", n, " ", x[n])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Apr 21 2009
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
